projects.title: Machine Learning Predicitve Models
projects.bodyText:
- Led a team to design and implement machine learning models to predict NBA game outcomes, leveraging Python for data preprocessing, analysis, and model development.
 - Developed and compared multiple machine learning algorithms, including SVM, Random Forest, and Logistic Regression, achieving accurate predictions based on PCA components.
 - Optimized model performance by conducting hyperparameter tuning and evaluating metrics such as accuracy, F1-score, and ROC-AUC to refine predictions and ensure robust results.

projects.title: OptiDrop Eyedropper for Glaucoma Patients
projects.bodyText:
- Conducted user research with 25 glaucoma patients and 4 ophthalmologists to identify key user challenges.
 - Developed a track-based alignment system and air-pressure dispensing mechanism using mechanical design and prototyping skills to ensure precise and efficient single-drop application.
 - Applied user-centered design principles by integrating feedback from patient testing to refine usability, ensuring the device was lightweight, affordable, and compatible with a wide range of bottle types.

projects.title: Dungeon Crawler Game
projects.bodyText:
- Led the development of a dungeon crawler game using Android Studios, showcasing teamwork and project coordination.
 - Implemented JUnit testing for robust code quality, ensuring the reliability and stability of the game's features.
 - Utilized Git for effective code version control and organization, streamlining collaboration among team members.
 - Integrated Android libraries in Java and XML to design a captivating UI that enhanced the overall gaming experience.

projects.title: Restaurant Management Application
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a JavaFX user interface application to organize ingredient data, calculating and presenting total costs for various recipes in a structured format for a restaurant management client.
 - Created a second version using PowerShell, WPF, and XAML, showcasing proficiency in different technologies and expanding the accessibility and ease of use of the program.

projects.title: Productivity Application
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a JavaFX-based To-Do List Applet, streamlining task, appointment, and homework management.
 - Integrated a reminder system for timely notifications, enhancing user productivity.
 - Created a Pomodoro Timer using JavaFX, allowing users to customize interval amounts for efficient time management.
 - Designed an intuitive user interface, providing a seamless experience for users to personalize their work and break sessions.
